Ini Besaran Kenaikan Tarif Tol Dalam Kota dan Jagorawi
05 Nov 2019, 10:35 by Herdi Alif Alhikam


Foto: Grandyos Zafna

Jakarta - Sejumlah ruas tol akan akan naik tarifnya akhir tahun ini. Jasa Marga selaku operator tol terbesar di Indonesia pun akan menaikkan tarif di beberapa ruas tol.Corporate Finance Group Head Jasa Marga Eka Setya Adrianto memperkirakan jumlah kenaikan tarif akan dipertimbangkan dari angka inflasi. Khususnya untuk dalam kota Jakarta, angka inflasi Jakarta selama dua tahun akan jadi pertimbangan utama."Kalau tarif sebetulnya sih temen-temen operasi yang hapal. Mungkin besarannya related to inflasi lah, inflasi akumulasi dua tahun berapa, kira-kira kisaran segitu naiknya," ujar pria yang akrab dipanggil Adri di Hotel Mulia, Jakarta, Selasa (5/11/2019).Menurut Adri kenaikan berkisar di antara 6-7% sesuai akumulasi inflasi Jakarta selama dua tahun."Kayaknya sih naik sekitar 6-7% lah. Seharusnya mirip-mirip itu lah nggak jauh dari situ naiknya sesuai inflasi Jakarta," ucap Adri.Sebelumnya, Corporate Communication & Community Development Group Head Jasa Marga Dwimawan Heru menyatakan tarif jalan tol Jakarta-Bogor-Ciawi (Jagorawi) dan tol dalam kota Jakarta bakal segera mengalami penyesuaian. Dua ruas tol milik Jasa Marga tersebut akan menyusul tol Jakarta-Tangerang (integrasi dengan Tangerang Merak) yang sudah lebih dulu mengalami penyesuaian pada akhir pekan lalu. Selain kedua ruas tersebut, ada pula beberapa ruas tol lainnya di luar Jabodetabek yang akan alami penyesuaian."Ada Belmera (Belawan-Medan-Tanjung Morawa), Palikanci (Palimanan-Kanci), Surgem (Surabaya-Gempol)" katanya saat ditemui di Hotel Mercure Ancol.Simak Video "Pengembalian Investasi, Tarif Tol Naik Akhir 2019"[Gambas:Video 20detik](zlf/zlf)

This is the magnitude of the increase in toll rates in the city and Jagorawi
05 Nov 2019, 10:35 by Herdi Alif Alhikam


Photo: Grandyos Zafna

Jakarta - A number of toll roads will increase their tariffs later this year. Jasa Marga as the largest toll operator in Indonesia will also raise tariffs on several toll road sections. Corporate Finance Group Head Jasa Marga Eka Setya Adrianto estimates that the increase in tariffs will be considered from the inflation rate. Particularly for Jakarta, the Jakarta inflation rate for two years will be the main consideration. "If the tariff is actually memorized operating friends. Maybe the magnitude is related to inflation, what is the accumulation of inflation in two years, about a range of so increasing," said the man who is familiarly called Adri at Hotel Mulia, Jakarta, Tuesday (11/05/2019). According to Adri, the increase ranged from 6-7% according to the accumulation of inflation in Jakarta for two years. "It should have been something like that, not far from there, the increase according to inflation in Jakarta," said Adri. undergo adjustment immediately. The two toll roads belonging to Jasa Marga will follow the Jakarta-Tangerang toll road (integration with Tangerang Merak), which had already been adjusted at the end of last week. In addition to the two sections, there are also several other toll roads outside Jabodetabek that will experience adjustments. "There are Belmera (Belawan-Medan-Tanjung Morawa), Palikanci (Palimanan-Kanci), Surgem (Surabaya-Gempol)" he said when met at the Hotel Mercure Ancol.Simak Video "Investment Returns, Toll Rates Rise End of 2019" [Gambas: Video 20seconds] (zlf / zlf)
